item.title: Blackbody to Cd and control with attribute
item.author: Author
item.description: Blackbody to Cd and control with attribute pyroBlackbody VOP Normal life attribute for example. Beware of before H17, pyroBlackbody does not have the option of minimum temperature (temp0). This may cause unexpected results in some situations. color space transform from XYZ to RGB
